thread.title: Hayden Panettiere is "voluntarily seeking professional help" for postpartum depression - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Hayden Panettiere is "voluntarily seeking professional help" for postpartum depression - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Hayden Panettiere is "voluntarily seeking professional help" for postpartum depression - Showbiz
text: Hayden Panettiere is currently receiving treatment for postpartum depression.The Nashville actress reached a decision to enter a treatment facility ten months after giving birth to daughter Kaya. Â© PA Images / John Shearer/AP A spokesperson for Panettiere told People: "[Hayden] is voluntarily seeking professional help at a treatment centre as she is currently battling postpartum depression."She asks that the media respect her privacy during this time."On her hit ABC series, Panettiere has portrayed the drama of postpartum depression through the eyes of her character Juliette Barnes.Panettiere and boxing champion Wladimir Klitschko welcomed their first daughter in December 2014. The couple have been together on and off since 2009, with Klitschko popping the question almost exactly two years ago.Panettiere spoke candidly about becoming a mother this past spring, describing parenthood as being the "most out-of-body experience".
